categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic brigades

nodes.text: The Special Operations Brigade, also known as the GAR special forces, were a brigade of clone special forces of the Grand Army of the Republic. GAR special forces units along with Jedi commonly used the Nu-class attack/transport shuttle thanks to its utility and versatility during the Clone Wars. Advanced Recon Commando troopers and Clone commandos were part of the brigade.[source?]
